articles.title: I Have No Sympathy for Exhibitors: Anurag Kashyap - The Quint
articles.description: Anurag Kashyap whose film Choked starring Saiyami Kher and Roshan Mathew just released on Netflix spoke to The Quint about exhibitors being miffed with filmmakers for releasing their films on OTT platforms.
